page.title: 05WOOTTON PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: { Wootton Primary School}is situated on Church Road,Wootton.The school was built in 1969 and has 125 pupils at present aged between 5-9 years of age.There are four different classes or years, class 1 being the youngest pupils to class 4 being the oldest. There are altogether 5 teachers.The school starts at 8.55am and finishes at 3.15pm, during the day they have 3 breaks, including the lunch hour. When they have finished their stay in primary school they can either go to {Downside Middle School, Newport}or {Mayfield Middle School Ryde}or if they wish they can go onto the{Church of {England Middle School, Newport. When we went there they were having their annual{sports day}which is held on the school field at the end of the school year.Every pupil in the school enters an event and many parents came
